br.span: will Remain Closed Through the End of the School Year.

h3.a: WA Earns Best Communities for Music Education for 3rd Consecutive Year

span.span: West Allegheny was selected as one of the
for 2020 by the NAMM Foundation for the 3

consecutive year. WA is one of 754 districts across the nation recognized for outstanding efforts by music teachers, administrators, parents, students and community leaders who have made music education part of a well-rounded education and demonstrate an exceptionally high commitment and access to music education. This award reflects the positive interactions and overall synergy between the WA music program and the district communities throughout the year.

h3.a: West Allegheny to Provide Meals During Closure

div.span: During the school closure, we will be providing any children age preschool through 18 who lives in West Allegheny District the opportunity to receive free meal service at both Wilson Elementary School and the High School.
Kindergarten Registration for the 2020-2021 School Year is now open. Please click HERE to register.

h3.a: WA Earns Outstanding Visual Arts Community 2019

div.span: West Allegheny has been recognized for its outstanding commitment to visual arts education and has received the endorsement "Outstanding Visual Arts Community 2019" by the Pennsylvania Art Educators Association. Congratulations to art teachers Claire March, Brittney Counihan, Sharon Harn, Leah Shuck and Mike Short.

img.alt: District Releases Student Academic Outcomes Report

h3.a: District Releases Student Academic Outcomes Report

div.span: West Allegheny School District is proud to release our 2017-2018 Student Academic Outcomes Report, which is to serve as a comprehensive, District-wide report card. We encourage parents to review the Student Outcomes Report to learn more about the academic progress and success of the District.
West Allegheny School District is pleased to release the approved 2020-2021chool Calendar.

span.p: This website is up to date with the latest web standards. You can view content utilizing Internet Explorer 7 or 8, FireFox, Safari, or Chrome.
If any page is not visible, refresh the page.
